MIME element (text/html) Violation of Cisco's Intellectual Property on hosted sites

Dear Sir or Madam:

                Thank you for your help with the following urgent legal abuse matter.  This firm represents Cisco Systems, Inc. and Cisco Technology, Inc. (“Cisco”), the copyright owner/s of the certain CCIE labs, which are software programs used in networking certification examinations.  Cisco also owns a CCIE federal trademark registration.

                Cisco has recently learned that intellectual property violations are occurring on the realccialabs.net site that your company hosts.  The site is advertising for sale unauthorized copies of real CCIE labs. 

                Cisco's CCIE labs are protected by copyright and trade secret law.  The sites also use Cisco's CCIE mark in violation of Cisco's federal trademark rights.  In addition, the sites use violates your company's acceptable use policy.

                We hereby request you take down the hosted content as soon as possible.  Accordingly, I hereby state and affirm, under penalty of perjury that:

        1.   Cisco owns the copyright for all real CCIE labs and a federal trademark registration for the CCIE mark

        2.   the copying and distribution of the CCIE labs is unauthorized, as is used of the CCIE mark

        3.   based upon my good faith belief, this copying and distribution, and the trademark use, are not authorized by Cisco, its agents, or the law;

        4.   I am Cisco’s authorized agent in this matter;

        5.   I can be reached using the following information:

            Karen Marie Kitterman
            Fenwick & West LLP
            Silicon Valley Center
            801 California Street
            Mountain View, CA 94041
            650-335-7966 phone
            650-938-5200 fax
            kkitterman@fenwick.com

 
                To the best of my knowledge, all of the statements made above are accure and true.

                Please note that this letter is not intended to constitute a full statement of all facts, rights or claims relating to this matter, nor is it intended, nor should it be construed as a waiver, release or relinquishment of any rights or remedies available to our client whether legal or equitable, all of which are hereby expressly reserved.

                Please confirm that you have taken all necessary steps to remove the offending material and stop distribution of it.  Thank you for your assistance with this matter.

/Karen Marie Kitterman /

Karen Marie Kitterman
Fenwick & West LLP
Silicon Valley Center
801 California Street
Mountain View, CA 94041
650-335-7966 phone
650-938-5200 fax
kkitterman@fenwick.com


-------------------------------------------
